dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: Eta Hiss Hiss! ON THE HSS. A collection of creepy Goth coeds.

dialogues.speaker: HSS SISTER
dialogues.text: Hiss...

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: And finally... Oozma Kappa... ON THE OOZMAS. The guys look small and pathetic. The crow goes silent, a lone cheer accompanies the group. Mike loo over to see Ms. Squibbles calling down from a sewer grate

dialogues.speaker: MS. SQUIBBLES
dialogues.text: YAY! Woohoo!

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: Hi Mom!

dialogues.speaker: MS. SQUIBBLES
dialogues.text: Smile! She snaps a picture. Back on the Oozmas, Mike sighs.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: Let’s begin the first competition: the toxicity challenge!

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: Human children are TOXIC! She makes her way across the stage now to point to a draw of children’s toys. GREEK COUNCIL PRESIDENT (CONT’D) And anything they touch is toxic.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: We don’t have any human toys but thanks to MU’s biology department, we've found a close second. The stinging glow urchin! Some students bring in a crate stamped with the words “MU BIOLOGY DEPT.” The president reaches into the crate with metal claw and pulls out a beautiful, glowing, spikey orb  The crowd recoils in fear. The urchin glows and sparks menacingly. GREEK COUNCIL VP (CONT’D) (to the crowd) Trust me when I say you are not gonna wanna touch this bad boy! ON Art in the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: ART
dialogues.text: I wanna touch it. ON president.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: And you certainly don’t wanna touch any of its friends. REVEAL an entrance to a tunnel... which is filled with hundreds of the toxic glow urchins scattered along the fl The crowd is terrified. ON Art.

dialogues.speaker: ART
dialogues.text: Yeah, I wanna touch ‘em. ON VP.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: (pointing to the tunnel) This is the starting line. The light at the end of the tunnel is the finish line.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: And whoever comes in last is eliminated from the games.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: Mike? Mike jumps.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Ah! What is it?

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: Does that mean if we lose we're out? 67.  68.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Don't worry, Smoothie.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: Squishy.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Squishy. We’re not gonna lose, because we have everything we need to win right here. Mike points to his chest.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: (smiling) Heart.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: No, me! I’m gonna win the race for us. Sulley pushes Mike out of the way.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Alright, alright, that’s very cute but move, move, move. I’m gonna win this.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: It’s an obstacle course - what are you gonna do roar at it?!

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: I can get through faster than you, little guy. ON Mike as he glares at Sulley and readies himself at the starting line. ON president.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: Take your place at the starting line! We see the fraternities and sororities lined up along the starting line of the Scare Games course.

dialogues.speaker: ROSIE
dialogues.text: This is all about teamwork.

dialogues.speaker: CARLA
dialogues.text: Everybody stick together.  69. The misfits stand in the background, behind Mike and Sull

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: I’m gonna beat you over that finish line!

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Get ready to eat my dust!

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: Hey guys, should we huddle up? ON president and VP.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: Attention teams, one last thing. Scarers work in the dark. With that, the floodlight is shut down, leaving the cours entirely dark. In the darkness, the glow urchins become infinitely more terrifying, glowing and sparking dangerou

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: (scared) I wanna go home.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: On your marks! Squishy, Terri and Terry turn to the PNKs finishing their huddle.

dialogues.speaker: TERRY
dialogues.text: (nervous ) Hey, good luck ladies.

dialogues.speaker: CARRIE
dialogues.text: Thanks, we're gonna rip you to pieces!

dialogues.speaker: TERRI
dialogues.text: What? The PNK SISTERS shoot the misfits an evil look.

dialogues.speaker: PNK SISTERS
dialogues.text: (hiss sound) The misfits are even more terrified now.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: Get set. Mike and Sulley glare at each other one last time.  70.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: GOo!!

dialogues.speaker: THE RACE BEGINS
dialogues.text: ART runs off, the Oozmas and all the other teams follow behind Art who leads the charge with a war cry!

dialogues.speaker: ART
dialogues.text: I’m gonna TOUCH ‘EM! He immediately hits a bunch of the glow urchins, which illuminate, shocking him. He comes crashing down and look over at his leg, which immediately balloons right up.

dialogues.speaker: ART, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (vocs getting hit & falling, then laughing) AH! WHOA! Ah! (ballooning up)

dialogues.speaker: AAAAAAH
dialogues.text: The crowd goes crazy. The teams are off! Mike and Sulley carefully start navigating the danger, ignoring the misfits. The EEK sisters are right behind the guys and one of them steps on an urchin.

dialogues.speaker: EEK SISTER
dialogues.text: Ow! The girls rally together and help their sister keep going

dialogues.speaker: CARLA
dialogues.text: Come on! ON THE MISFITS who call out to Mike and Sulley.

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: (calling out) Uh guys, we’re falling behind a little. FELLAS? (steps on urchin) Aaah! CHEESE AND CRACKERS! Ooh!

dialogues.speaker: SON OF A MUSTACHE
dialogues.text: STEAK, that hurts! Squishy covers his ears. BACK ON Sulley and Mike who are busy trying to outrun eac other.  71.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (running) Is that as fast as you can go?

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: (running) Just getting started!

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: What the- Urchins whiz past them fired by monsters standing above t with slingshots. Mike and Sulley try their best to avoid the flying urchin Sulley is hit by an urchin in the shoulder and instantly swells up.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Ah! He grabs the urchin on his shoulder and his hand swells u

dialogues.speaker: AHH
dialogues.text: Mike runs ahead but turns back to laugh at Sulley.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Ooh, that’s gotta HURT! Mike is hit by an urchin and falls. He looks at his foot it swells up!

dialogues.speaker: AH
dialogues.text: The RORs with their awesome skills and their teamwork, quickly leave them in the dust. Sulley runs whizzing past Mike. Mike’s determination is renewed. He keeps his swollen leg lifted as he hops along in pain.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (getting up grunt) Ow, OW, OW, OW, Ow, ooh! ON THE MISFITS. Terri and Terry duck to avoid an urchin.  72.

dialogues.speaker: TERRI
dialogues.text: (out of breath) Terry!

dialogues.speaker: TERRY
dialogues.text: (out of breath) Don’t worry, we'll be fine-- (hit in face by urchin) Aaaah! Terry’s face swells up and he screams! Now not looking where they’re going, they step onto anoth urchin.

dialogues.speaker: TERRI/TERRY
dialogues.text: Ahhhh! They trip and fall as their leg swells up. Squishy sees them and screams. He runs off in a panic and starts getting pummeled with urchins. BAM! An urchin flies into his mouth. He swells into a gia pink ball. The monster that threw it fist bumps another monster.

dialogues.speaker: ON MIKE AND SULLEY
dialogues.text: Mike and Sulley follow the RORs. Still hopping on one leg Mike smiles as he sees that Sulley is behind him. Turning back, he ducks an urchin. This throws him off balance and he loses control, landing an urchin with his good foot.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (landing on urchin) Yikes! (leg swells) Ow! They have entered part of the course where urchins hang a around on strings at different heights. He maneuvers to avoid them.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (yelling; avoiding urchins) Ow, Ow, Ow, ow!  73. ON SULLEY. Sulley puts his head down and barrels through the urchins getting zapped along the way. Sulley continues to push through and catches up with Mike They are neck and neck. The RORs cross the finish line first.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: OH! ROAR OMEGA ROAR wins!

dialogues.speaker: CROWD
dialogues.text: (cheering) Mike and Sulley race to the end. Finally, Mike and Sulley leap across the finish line at t exact same time.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: (heavy breathing) Take that, Wazowski.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Are you delirious? I beat you.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Get your eye checked-- The crowd sees them and starts laughing.

dialogues.speaker: CHET
dialogues.text: Oh way to blow it, Oozmas!

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Hey, second place ain't bad!

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: Second place, Jaws Theta Chi!

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Your whole team has to cross the finish line!

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: Third place EEKs...Fourth place PNKs...

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: Fifth place HSS...

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: No...no...NO!

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: And in last place, Oozma Kappa! Mike turns around in time to see the battered and bruised Oozma Kappa cross the finish line. Don rolls Squishy out then collapses.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: I can’t feel my anything.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: Oh shocker, Oozma Kappa has been eliminated! ON THE LEADER BOARD, Oozma Kappa’s name is removed.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: No... (gasp) Mike backs up in a panic directly into Dean HARDSCRABBLE.

dialogues.speaker: HARDSCRABBLE
dialogues.text: Don’t look so surprised, Mr. Wazowski. It would have taken a miracle for you to s-- Mike turns to Hardscrabble, it dawns on him, he’s done. ON the VP.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: Attention everyone! We have an announcement! Jaws Theta Chi has been disqualified.

dialogues.speaker: CROWD
dialogues.text: (shocked WALLA) What? Mike looks up to the stage, “what?”

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: The use of illegal protective gel is cause for elimination.  75.

dialogues.speaker: CROWD
dialogues.text: (walla) Boo!

dialogues.speaker: BIG RED
dialogues.text: What? A referee wipes goop off George Sanderson's leg and pokes with the urchin. Zap! Swell.

dialogues.speaker: GEORGE SANDERSON
dialogues.text: Ow!

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: Which means, Oozma Kappa is back in the games! It’s a miracle! Hardscrabble can’t believe it. She glares at Mike.

dialogues.speaker: HARDSCRABBLE
dialogues.text: Your luck will run out eventually. Mike looks worried. He glances at his team. The Oozma Kap wave at him looking friendly and pathetic.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: This is gonna be harder than I thought. The Oozma Kappa name is put back on the scoreboard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mike has gathered the team together on the quad. He passe before them like a drill sergeant as Sulley leans against tree behind him.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Okay, listen up Oozmas! Now we're gonna have to start winning these things together, so that means I’m gonna need each of you guys to pull your own weight. Squishy appears behind Mike.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: Mike.  76.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Ah! What is it?

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: We've made a list of our strengths and weaknesses.

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: In high school I was the master of the “silent scare.” Why I could sneak up on a field mouse in a pillow factory. Don delicately creeps along the ground on his hands and knees, but his tentacles stick to the sidewalk. He awkwar pulls them up each with a loud, grating, popping sound.

dialogues.speaker: DON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (struggling) Sorry, they get stickier when I’m sweaty. (keeps walking) Oh my gosh, that’s terrible. Wait, no, no... Mike just stares at him.... Terry pulls out playing cards and begins to do a card tri

dialogues.speaker: TERRY
dialogues.text: We're experts in the ancient craft of close-up magic.

dialogues.speaker: TERRI
dialogues.text: (mysterious) It’s all about misdirection. Cards spill out of Terri’s sleeve and Terry sighs, embarrassed.

dialogues.speaker: ART
dialogues.text: I have an extra toe. (laughing, sotto) Not with me of course. Mike calls out to quiet the team.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Guys, one slipup in the next event and we’re goners. So for this to work, I’m gonna need you to take every instinct you have and bury it deep, deep down.  Mike crumples up their list and throws it away.

dialogues.speaker: ART
dialogues.text: Done.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: From now on we are of one mind, my mind. Sulley rolls his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Oh please.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: I will tell you exactly what to do and how to do it.

dialogues.speaker: MISFITS
dialogues.text: (unsure) Okay Mike./That seems about right./Sure.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Alright, give me scary steps! Fifty, up and down. Right now, let’s go! Sulley walks over to Mike.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: You're wasting your time...we need a new team.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (mocking) We can't just get a new team. I checked this morning, it's against the rules.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: What if we disguise the new team to look like the old team?

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Oh, no, no, no, no. We are not cheating.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: It’s not cheating, I’m just, you know, leveling the playing field.... Mike stares at him. 77.  78.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Okay, so it’s kind of cheating! But what do you want me to do? They're not exactly the scariest group in the world. Sulley points to the misfits now distracted from their training, crowded around Squishy.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: Oh, a ladybug! Make a wish! Make a wish! Art blows it off Squishy’s arm. They all laugh, enjoying fly away. Hopelessness sets in.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: This is not gonna work. Sulley leaves.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Where are you going? We're training!

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: I'm a Sullivan.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: That's not enough. You’re all over the place, you’re charging ahead when you need to--

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Eh, b-b-b-bep. You tell them what to do, but not me. So long, coach. Sulley passes by a group of girls in the quad and shoots finger pistols.

dialogues.speaker: GIRLS
dialogues.text: (giggling) Mike watches concerned as Sulley heads off.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Okay Oozmas- He turns and jumps! Squishy is standing right behind him.  79.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: AH! Boy, we need to get you a bell. Mike turns to the group and pulls out the open envelope f the Scare Games and reads it.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Listen up! “If a kid hears you coming, they'll call mom or dad. Then you better run fast or things will get bad.”

dialogues.speaker: ART
dialogues.text: Huh?

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: In the next event, if even one of us gets caught, we’re all out. So remember, do EXACTLY what I do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON THE OOZMAs, as they sneak through the library, terrifi of making a noise. They copy Mike’s every move. ON VP and president surrounded by a group of onlookers in nearby balcony overlooking the action.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: (whispered to crowd) We are at the halfway point of the second event, and things are getting interesting. The misfits walk in line with Mike, revealing an annoyed Sulley. Sulley looks ahead to see the HSS sisters as they reach for their flag.

dialogues.speaker: HSS SISTER
dialogues.text: Got it! They quickly get out of the library, having passed the te The other two flags left hanging are green and purple for two remaining teams.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: (whispered) Only two teams left. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL PRESIDENT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Who will make it out with their flag and who will be eliminated? REVEAL THE EEKs as they sneak along too.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: (whispered) In a real scare you do not wanna get caught by a kid’s parent, and in this event you DO NOT want to get caught by...”The librarian.”

dialogues.speaker: ON AN OLD MONSTER LIBRARIAN
dialogues.text: As she presses her tentacle fingers to her lips and quiet the room.

dialogues.speaker: LIBRARIAN
dialogues.text: Shhh. Quiet. She can hear a pin drop but she needs strong glasses to s anything. ON the Oozmas and the EEKs creeping toward their flags.

dialogues.speaker: TERRI
dialogues.text: (whisper) Phhft, what’s so scary about a little old librarian? A student is studying and gets up from his chair and the floor makes a small squeak. Suddenly, the old librarian rises up, turning into a terrifying creature. She grabs hold of the student and lifts him up.

dialogues.speaker: LIBRARIAN
dialogues.text: I said, quiet....

dialogues.speaker: AHHHHH
dialogues.text: She throws the student through the dome of the library.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The student flies through the air, dropping through a tre and into the river.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd cheers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON Mike and the misfits shocked as the librarian soars ov them to the other end of the library. Mike breaths deeply, turns around and starts to put his f down. The board underneath squeaks so Mike quickly moves it to another board. The misfits begin a slow, steady pace through the library they literally walk exactly as Mike does. Sulley can’t handle their pace.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: (whispered)

dialogues.speaker: FASTER
dialogues.text: Mike corrects him-

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (whispered) Slow and steady.

dialogues.speaker: ART
dialogues.text: (whispered) Slow and steady.

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: (whispered) Slow and steady.

dialogues.speaker: TERRI/TERRY
dialogues.text: (whispered) Slow and steady.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: (whispered) Slow and steady. The misfits relay the exact message down the line to Sull the exact way Mike did. They continue to move really slow as Sulley is increasingly frustrated. Sulley can’t take it. He bolts forward, leaving his teammates behind. Mike’s eye goes wide.  82.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (gasp, whispered) Sullivan!

dialogues.speaker: ART
dialogues.text: (repeated) Sullivan!

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: (repeated) Sullivan!

dialogues.speaker: TERRI/TERRY
dialogues.text: (repeated) Sullivan!

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: (repeated) Sullivan! Mike shushes the misfits.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (whispered)

dialogues.speaker: SHHH
dialogues.text: But they shush him back exactly as he did.

dialogues.speaker: ART
dialogues.text: (repeated)

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: (repeated)

dialogues.speaker: TERRI/TERRY
dialogues.text: (repeated)

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: (repeated)

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (sigh)

dialogues.speaker: ART
dialogues.text: (repeated) (sigh)

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: (repeated) (sigh)  83.

dialogues.speaker: TERRI/TERRY
dialogues.text: (repeated) (sigh)

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: (repeated) (sigh) Sulley runs to a book ladder and climbs on. It makes a lo creak! Everyone stops and looks back at the librarian. The librarian turns around at Sulley’s noise but luckily can’t see very well.

dialogues.speaker: LIBRARIAN
dialogues.text: Hmmmm... She goes about her business. Mike gives a sigh of relief. But he gasps when he sees Sulley racing to the top of the ladder. Sulley reaches for the Oozmas flag and almost gets it - But the ladder starts to come off the tracks under the strain. Sulley falls to the ground with a thunderous SLAM. The librarian spins toward the sound, and quickly runs toward Sulley.

dialogues.speaker: LIBRARIAN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Grrrr...

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: No... Her tentacles poised to grab him - he cringes, waiting to yanked - but just then...

dialogues.speaker: POP
dialogues.text: The librarian whips around - who’s making that noise? It’s DON! And he’s on his hands and knees crawling along floor. His tentacles are making a loud, sticky, suction c sound.

dialogues.speaker: LIBRARIAN
dialogues.text: Grrrr... The librarian leaves Sulley behind and makes a beeline fo DON, her tentacles shooting toward him.  84. Now it’s Don’s turn to cringe, bracing for impact. Just before the librarian reaches Don... Terri and Terry start-up their crazy dance moves.

dialogues.speaker: TERRI
dialogues.text: (yelling) 5, 6, 7, 8! Da-Da-da-da-da...look over here!

dialogues.speaker: TERRY
dialogues.text: Over here! Ahhhh!

dialogues.speaker: TERRI
dialogues.text: Da-da-da-da! Over here now.... The librarian stops in her tracks and now she turns towar Terri and Terry. Now it’s Terri and Terry’s turn to be scared. But just as the librarian’s tentacle reaches for them-- Art is now standing on top of a table stomping his feet a laughing hysterically. ON VP and member of the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: CROWD MEMBER
dialogues.text: Is that legal?

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: You better believe it, mop top! The only rule is don’t get caught. As the librarian guns for Art, he somersaults off the tab and rolls around in front of her, laughing like a mad man Mike looks on, horrified. The EEKs are using a human rope to get to their flag. Art continues rolling right past Sulley. Terri and Terry shout at the librarian.

dialogues.speaker: TERRI/TERRY
dialogues.text: (shouting) Over here! As the librarian pursues Terri and Terry, one of her tentacles knocks the EEK pyramid over.

dialogues.speaker: TERRI/TERRY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (shouting) Come and get me! Come get me!  85.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Guys, what are you doing? She charges after the whole group. The misfits run past M and pull him along.

dialogues.speaker: TERRY
dialogues.text: They said don’t let her catch you!

dialogues.speaker: TERRI
dialogues.text: .--but they didn’t say how!

dialogues.speaker: OOZMA KAPPA
dialogues.text: (walla, seeing the librarian catch up to them) AHH! /Move it, move it!/Come on! The Oozmas narrowly miss her outstretched tentacles and b through the library front doors to safety. OOZMA KAPPA (CONT’D) (jumping out) Ahhhhh!!!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Oozmas land in a heap, excited they made it out.

dialogues.speaker: ART
dialogues.text: Woo! We did it! Mike spins around furious.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: No we didn’t, we forgot the flag! Mike is suddenly interrupted.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: Mike?

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Ah! Squishy holds up the OK flag.

dialogues.speaker: MISFITS
dialogues.text: (cheer walla) Way to go, Squishy!

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: How...?  86. Terri leans into Mike.

dialogues.speaker: TERRI
dialogues.text: (mysterious) ..-misdirection. The EEK sisters come flying out of the roof of the librar

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: The EEKs have been eliminated and Oozma Kappa live to scare another day! Meanwhile, a displeased Hardscrabble stands nearby observ Art, Terri, Terry, Squishy and Don celebrate.

dialogues.speaker: MISFITS
dialogues.text: (laughing, chanting) We're OK! We're OK! We're OK! We're OK! We're OK! Mike watches the misfits. He smiles, appreciating what they’ve done.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Oozmas walk home from the event, still on a high.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: I've never felt so alive!

dialogues.speaker: TERRI
dialogues.text: We were awesome!

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Okay, look, that wasn’t real scaring.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: It was better then what you did. You should have stuck to my strategy.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Whatever, talk to me when we start the real scaring-- Mike’s brow furrows. Just as the misfits make it to their house, a car filled with members from the PNKs sorority pulls up.  87.

dialogues.speaker: CARRIE
dialogues.text: Hey, you guys going to the party?

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: Oh, I think you've got the wrong guys, we don’t get invited to--

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (trying to stop Squishy) Z-z-zip! Party?

dialogues.speaker: CARRIE
dialogues.text: The mid-games mixer at the RORs.

dialogues.speaker: BRITNEY
dialogues.text: It’s for the top scare teams... you're one of us now, right?

dialogues.speaker: CARRIE
dialogues.text: See you there! Laughing, the girls drive off. The misfits look to each other, surprised.

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: Did you hear that?

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: I can’t believe it.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Uh-uh. Bad idea.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: This is great. They’re finally seeing us as real scarers. We're going!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Oozmas head up the stairs to the ROR house. Sulley lo uncomfortable as they approach the closed door. Hearing t loud music, the misfits start to get cold feet.

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: (nervous ) Do young people still dance? Cause my moves are a little rusty.

dialogues.speaker: TERRY
dialogues.text: Ah, we forgot to bring a hostess gift!  The The INT. The room is full of big partying monsters. see the misfits standing in the door way.

dialogues.speaker: TERRI
dialogues.text: We can’t go in there without some scented candles.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Calm down. We earned this.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: (nervous ) What if there’s a lull in the conversation? I-I never know what to...you know...

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: -.-Say?

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: How are you so good at this?!

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: You just took on an angry 50-foot librarian and you're afraid of a little party? Take a deep breath. misfits inhale and exhale.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: And in ya go! doors open wide.

dialogues.speaker: ROR HOUSE
dialogues.text: Squishy looks terrified, Mike nudges him.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: Hello. The crowd stares at them blankly.

dialogues.speaker: PARTY MONSTER
dialogues.text: It’s Oozma Kappa!

dialogues.speaker: PARTY MONSTER
dialogues.text: These guys are crazy!

dialogues.speaker: PARTY MONSTER
dialogues.text: What you did today was insane!

dialogues.speaker: PARTY MONSTER
dialogues.text: That was awesome! They all turn to The music stops. 88.  89. The music starts up and the monsters go back to partying.

dialogues.speaker: MISFITS
dialogues.text: Thank you!/Thanks so much!

dialogues.speaker: PARTY MONSTERS
dialogues.text: Oozmas, yeah! Mike looks to Sulley, who is also shocked. Mike turns to misfits with a smile on his face.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Oozma Kappa, tonight we party like scarers!

dialogues.speaker: YEAH
dialogues.text: CUT TO the dance floor. Each group is doing their thing! Art is busting some crazy moves. Don shows his stuff. Terri and Terry are lovin’ the beat. Squishy is dancing with the PNKs.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: I've never stayed up this late in my life.

dialogues.speaker: PNK SISTERS
dialogues.text: (laughing) Squishy is having a great time on the dance floor and spi Sulley standing by himself. He decides to lasso him onto dance floor. Sulley is not amused. Squishy is undeterred and begins “reeling” him in. Sulley gives into his enthusiasm and reluctantly hops his way onto the dance fl with the rest of the misfits.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: woo!

dialogues.speaker: PARTY MONSTERS
dialogues.text: Woo-woo! Woo-woo! Mike wanders to a hallway at the side of the party where portraits of the great Scare Game winners are located. He sees the Scare Games trophy, set on a pedestal at the end the room. As he approaches, Mike sees his reflection in i Distorted by its shape, he looks big and impressive. Mike raises his claws and makes a small growl face. ON JOHNNY as he addresses the party crowd.  90.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: (whistle) Hey, quiet! QUIET! Quiet down you can wranglers! Alright, on behalf of the RORs....

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: We'd like to congratulate all the teams that have made it this far! Everyone cheers. Johnny points to each of the teams.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Alright, let’s hear it for the

dialogues.speaker: PNK SISTERS
dialogues.text: (Hiss)

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Love that trick, never gets old!

dialogues.speaker: HSS SISTERS
dialogues.text: (Hiss)

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Very creepy! And finally the surprise team of the scare games, OOZMA KAPPA! Come on over, guys. The crowd parts, spotlighting Oozma Kappa.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Now I gotta admit fellas, I thought you were a bunch of nobodies, but boy was I wrong. lLet’s hear it for Oozma Kappa!

dialogues.speaker: CROWD
dialogues.text: Oozma Kappa! Suddenly without warning, the Oozmas are splattered with paint.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Wha--?

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: The most adorable monsters on campus.  91. A bug monster then presses a button and a machine shoots glitter confetti at the Oozmas, sticking right to them. Another ROR brother tosses a bucket of flowers at them. T have become a laughing stock.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Release the stuffed animals! Randy pulls on a rope, connected to a net full of stuffed animals. They drop and Chet quickly snaps a picture.

dialogues.speaker: CHET
dialogues.text: (laugh) Faced! The screen goes white.

dialogues.speaker: EXT. CAMPUS, NEXT DAY
dialogues.text: Pulling back from one of the photos of the team covered i glitter and paint to reveal it’s printed on the cover of school’s newspaper: THE CAMPUS ROAR. Mike puts the papers the trash. ON the misfits walking to class. Mike is furious but does his best to boost the team’s morale.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Don’t worry. Nobody reads the school paper.

dialogues.speaker: ART
dialogues.text: Yeah, but I’m pretty sure they read the quad. Mike looks over, stunned. Trees, light posts, poster kios all covered with the photo in every shape and size. The entire quad is blanketed with the embarrassing image as students look on and laugh. A giant banner is unfurled on the clock tower. Mike’s shock is broken by an offscreen voice.

dialogues.speaker: CHET
dialogues.text: Thank you very much, okay would you like that with two sleeves or four? He turns to see Johnny and the RORs selling shirts and ot merchandise featuring the photo.  92.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Thanks! Tell your friends! Furious, Mike marches over followed by the team.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Hey, what do you think you’re doing?

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Raising a little money for charity.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Yeah, well stop it!

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: You want us to stop raising money for charity? That’s not cool.

dialogues.speaker: CHET
dialogues.text: (calling out) This guy hates charity!

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: I want you to stop making us look like fools.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Hey, you’re making yourselves look like fools. Johnny pulls out the paper.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Let’s be honest boys, you’re never gonna be REAL scarers, because real scarers look like us. He gestures to himself and his team.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: But hey, if you really want to work for a scare company, they’re always hiring in the mail room. Johnny turns around the paper to reveal a help-wanted ad the Monsters, Inc. mail room. The misfits take this in as everyone laughs at them. With that Sulley fumes and heads off. The misfits follow, dejected. Mike runs after them.  93.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Guys, hold on! Hey, hey, hey, wait a second! Don’t listen to him. We just need to keep trying-

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: No, you need to stop trying! You can train monsters like this all you want, but you can’t change who they are. Sulley walks off.

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: Mike, we appreciate everything you've done...but he’s right. No matter how much we train, we’1l never look like them. We’re built for other things. Don looks at his card. The misfits follow after Sulley. Mike watches them go, helpless. Chet approaches holding a mug with the photo on it.

dialogues.speaker: CHET
dialogues.text: (slurp) Sorry Squirt, some monsters just aren’t cut out for the big leagues. (laugh) Mike stares out and suddenly something dawns on him. He takes off--

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (sotto) The big leagues.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mike bursts through the door and catches up with the misf and Sulley.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Guys! We’re going on a little field trip.  94.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ms. Squibbles drives a car filled with the Oozma Kappas. pulls over and stops, and the Oozma Kappas stretch as the climb out of the car.

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: Okay, I need to get out....

dialogues.speaker: ART
dialogues.text: Excuse me, my leg’s caught. There we go, I got it.

dialogues.speaker: TERRI
dialogues.text: Ah...my tentacle fell asleep.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: Thanks, mom!

dialogues.speaker: MS. SQUIBBLES
dialogues.text: Have fun, kids! I’11 just be here, listening to my tunes. Ms. Squibbles rolls up the window, and we hear muted heav metal thrasher music pounding from inside the car.

dialogues.speaker: ART
dialogues.text: Hey, uh, where are we? Mike walks up to a gate with the guys behind him. Mike lo over the gate in awe, as we reveal... Monsters, Incorpora

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: The big leagues. Sulley is stunned.

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: Holy, rolly polly...

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: Wow!

dialogues.speaker: ART
dialogues.text: Nice fence.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: This is amazing, Mike!

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: We're not stopping here.  95. Mike holds up a pair of wire cutters and does a chop-chop action. EXT. MONSTERS, INC. We see a fence cut out and a “No Trespassing” sign on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: (nervous voc) We pan up and see the guys climbing a ladder that gets th onto the roof of Monsters, Inc.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: This is crazy, we're gonna get arrested!

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Shh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all look down through a window and all their eyes go wide.

dialogues.speaker: MISFITS
dialogues.text: Oh, whoa! Wow. (excited laugh)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We look down on a working scare floor. The floor is full scarers moving in and out of their active doors. We see several monsters go through their entire routine.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: Look at them, they’re going into the human world and they don’t even look scared! Mike and Sulley take it all in. They’re awestruck. The fraternity brothers look down in amazement.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (to the group) Take a good look, fellas. See what they all have in common? Squishy strains, but then turns to Mike confused.  96.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: Ehhh...no, not really.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Exactly. A sea of monsters of all shapes, sizes, ages, genders, fi the floor, all scaring in their own way.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: There’s no ONE type of scarer. The best scarers use their differences to their advantage. The team smiles watching all the various types of monster using their varied appearances, sizes and shapes in uniqu skillful ways. A tall skinny guy with long skinny arms flails them aroun like wild hoses. Squishy watches a puff ball turn into a spider.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: Wow.

dialogues.speaker: TERRY
dialogues.text: Terri, look! ON a three-headed monster as it comes out of a room. Sulley is starting to see Mike in a new light. Huh. Mike might actually be right about this. The misfits are certainly inspired....

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: Hey, look at that old fella rackin’ up the big numbers!

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (amazed) Don, that “old fella” is Earl “The Terror” Thompson!

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: What! Where?! That’s really him?

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: He held the scare record for three years!

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Oh, third door from the end. ON a female scarer.  97.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Carla “Killer Claws” Benitez. Sulley can’t believe what he’s seeing.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Look, it’s Screaming Bob Gunderson!

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I still have his rookie card.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Me too!

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Doesn’t have the speed any more but his--

dialogues.speaker: MIKE SULLEY
dialogues.text: --technique is flawless. --technique is flawless. The guys have never had this kind of interaction before. They're not instant friends - it’s just a moment.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: You collected scare cards, huh?

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Yep. Four hundred and fifty of ‘em.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Impressive. I have 6,000, still in mint condition. But you know, four fifty’s pretty good too. ON THE MISFITS, inspired by what they’re seeing on the fl

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: Hey, look at me, I’m Earl The Terror Thompson! ROAR! Squishy makes a scary face.

dialogues.speaker: MISFITS
dialogues.text: Hey, that’s a pretty good one, Squish!/Alright, Squishy! /Not bad...you felt it. (laughter) ON SULLEY AND MIKE watching the guys, then Sulley looks a the floor.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: I've been a real jerk....  98.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: So have I. (beat) But it’s not too late. We could be a great team, we just need to start working together.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY GUARD
dialogues.text: Hey!

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (gasp)

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY GUARD
dialogues.text: What are you doing up there?! Everyone freezes.

dialogues.speaker: ART
dialogues.text: I can’t go back to jail! Art starts running, the others quickly follow.

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: Hey...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mike, Sulley, and the misfits take off!

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Come on! The gang hustles, pursued by guards. They climb a ladder. Sulley looks back.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: (gasp) ON THE GUARDS as they see them climbing. Back ON the guys as they try to go down a ladder.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (gasp)

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY GUARDS
dialogues.text: Up there! Get ‘em! But the guards are at the bottom so they change direction They start hopping over the rooftops.  99. Squishy is one of the last ones to jump and nearly falls Sulley catches him.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: (panic breaths) Thanks brother. Sulley puts Squishy on his shoulders.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Don’t mention it! (running efforts) They catch up with the rest of the team. A beat later, Don is winded - he can’t keep up.

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: (heavy breathing) I'm fine, really, it’s just a little heart attack. Sulley picks him up as well. Art catches up to Sulley-

dialogues.speaker: ART
dialogues.text: Oh, I want a piece of that action! They all jump onto Sulley’s back. Sulley rounds the corner, now carrying all the misfits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They round the bend and sprint to the car just ahead of t guards.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: Mom, start the car! They duck through the hole in the fence. Ms. Squibbles lowers her window.

dialogues.speaker: MS. SQUIBBLES
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: Start the car!  100.

dialogues.speaker: MS. SQUIBBLES
dialogues.text: (confused) Stop the bar?

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: The CAR! Start the car!

dialogues.speaker: MS. SQUIBBLES
dialogues.text: Oh okay! She starts the car as they pile in.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Come on, come on, come on, come On...

dialogues.speaker: ART
dialogues.text: In, in!

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: Mom, go!

dialogues.speaker: MS. SQUIBBLES
dialogues.text: Seat belts. The group quickly buckles as the guards move closer.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: Okay, go! Mom reaches under the visor.

dialogues.speaker: MS. SQUIBBLES
dialogues.text: Does anyone want gum?

dialogues.speaker: MS. SQUIBBLES
dialogues.text: Okay, here we go. Woo! Mike reaches forward and slams on the gas. The car peels away just as the guards catch up....

dialogues.speaker: OOZMA KAPPA
dialogues.text: Aaaahhhh! (laughing)

dialogues.speaker: ART
dialogues.text: Let's break in somewhere else!  101.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE UP on a sewing machine. Scissors cut green fabric. Letters are being sewn onto the fabric. As it turns we reveal “OK” is the logo. CUT TO each of the Oozma members putting on a team shirt sweater, then Mike putting on an Oozma hat. Sulley steps into the room, putting on his shirt. Mike an Sulley smile at each other. INT. MIKE AND SULLEY’S BEDROOM The alarm clock turns to 6:00 a.m. Mike jumps out of bed.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (to Sulley) Rise and shine! Sulley shoots straight up out of bed and hits his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mike drills the team.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Scary feet! Scary feet! Scary feet! The kid’s in the bathroom! The guys immediately get down low on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Scary feet! Scary feet! Scary feet! Ooh, he’s back!

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. MIKE AND SULLEY’S BEDROOM The alarm clock turns to 6:00 a.m.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Wake up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (startled awake) Ah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the rain, Sulley is doing push-ups with all the misfit his back.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: (push-up efforts) Roar!

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Thirty-seven.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: (push-up efforts) Roar!

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Thirty-eight.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: (push-up efforts) Roar!

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Do I hear 39?

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: (push-up efforts) Roar!

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Come on!

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: ON JOHNNY AND CHET watching. Johnny shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: ON ENVELOPE
dialogues.text: Mike reads the next event of the Scare Games. 102.  103.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: “To frighten a child is the point of a scare. If you frighten a TEEN then scarer beware!” Mike reaches down and grabs a stick that represents a hum kid.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Okay, scare the little kid.... Mike throws in a stick that represents a human kid.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Roar!

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Avoid the teenager! Sulley ducks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Event #3. “Don’t Scare the Teen.” Pull back on this large scale maze. A PNK sister comes around a corner.

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGER
dialogues.text: I’m on the phone!

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: Roar! The red light buzzes, fail. Another PNK sister comes to another standee.

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGER
dialogues.text: No one understands me!

dialogues.speaker: ROAR
dialogues.text: Buzz, fail!

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGER
dialogues.text: Whatever!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Buzz, fail! Eventually the whole team is trapped in the middle of the maze with nowhere to go. Art comes dashing around a corner. A teenager on a stande pops up.

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGER
dialogues.text: But daddy I love him! Art hides around the corner and the light on the standee turns green. The standee moves out of his way and Art is able to continue down that path. Art takes off through the maze. ON SQUISHY. A young child standee pops up and Squishy immediately scares the standee.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: Roar! Simulator scream, green light! Score! The RORs come out victorious.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: First place, ROAR OMEGA ROAR! Second place, Oozma Kappa! But the crowd erupts when they see the Oozmas make it out before the PNKs.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: Third place, HSS! ON THE SCOREBOARD. The PNKs are eliminated and the Oozma Kappas move up another notch. Fans cheer them on! Back in the maze the PNKs are still stuck. Another teenager standee pops up behind Carrie.

dialogues.speaker: TEENAGER
dialogues.text: You're lame.  105. Carrie turns to the teenager and blows fire, charring the standee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oozma Kappa is gathered in the quad. Mike pulls out another black envelope and reads the messa

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: “Someone is coming, this could ruin your night! Stay hidden, take cover, and stay out of sight. You’ve got ten seconds, go!” Ten seconds go by and...Mike immediately points out where everyone is hiding.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kiosk! Pile of leaves! Standing out in the open! Art is standing, staring at a butterfly.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: And there should be one more.... He hears a whistle from up above.

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: (whistle) How'd I do?

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Oh, not too shabby, Don!

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: Thanks! I cannot get down.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. MIKE AND SULLEY’S BEDROOM Mike quizzes Sulley on the different scare faces.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Zombie snarl. Sulley jets out his lower jaw like a piranha.  106.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Angry poodle. Sulley snarls his teeth like a little dog.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Jazz clown. Sulley makes a clown face.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: My Aunt Phyllis. Sulley imitates his aunt.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: In the morning! Sulley makes a more sullen face.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: That’s what I’m talking about!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mike teaches Don about his tentacles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don has a helmet on and is terrified. Sulley holds Don on his feet and launches him into the air at a wall.

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: Aaaaaah! (impact voc) Ha ha! He sticks! He proceeds to climb up the wall using his suction cup arms.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. MIKE AND SULLEY’S BEDROOM Sulley jumps down out of bed first this time.  107.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Time to go to work! Mike and Sulley both get out of bed at the same time, maneuvering around their small room without getting in ea other's way. It’s fluid as they work as a team. They both head off to class.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Event #4, “Hide and Sneak.” A crowd gathers as lights fla out of the windows of the fraternity house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the RORs hides in a plant while Randy slinks up a shade, disappearing completely. A referee with several eyes sneaks around with a flashlig trying to find competitors. The flashlight lands on a curtain. It’s pulled back to reveal a HSS sorority sister The referee blows the whistle.

dialogues.speaker: REFEREE
dialogues.text: You're out! The referee hears a rattle and catches a one-eyed monster holding up an end table.

dialogues.speaker: REFEREE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You're out! The light finds the fireplace where debris falls down the chute. Another HSS sister falls and lands in the soot.

dialogues.speaker: REFEREE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Yeah, yeah, tough luck, Kris Kringle. She walks off frustrated. The referee follows and complet misses Sulley who disguises himself as a bear rug.  108. Sulley stands up and runs off. Mike turns around from ins a globe holder and we pan up and see Don attached to the ceiling with his suction cups.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: The front door of the ROR house. Roar Omega Roar emerges victorious, closely followed by Oozma Kappa.

dialogues.speaker: CROWD
dialogues.text: (cheering)

dialogues.speaker: CHET
dialogues.text: Thank you! The Oozma fans go nuts!

dialogues.speaker: CROWD
dialogues.text: (Big cheer!)

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: (thrilled)

dialogues.speaker: MS. SQUIBBLES
dialogues.text: Woo! YEAH! They move ahead in the games. The three remaining teams have just finished the latest competition.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: We're down to two remaining teams! Roar Omega Roar and Oozma Kappa! The Greek VP opens a black envelope and announces...

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: Which leads us to the final event. “Every one of your skills will be put to the test. The scare simulator will prove who's the best.” Tomorrow night you finally get to SCARE in front of the whole school! Mike smiles, thrilled. The crowd begins to break up. Johnny and the RORs pass.  109.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Enjoy the attention while it lasts, boys. After you lose, no one will remember you.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Maybe, but when you lose no one will let you forget it.

dialogues.speaker: CHET
dialogues.text: (sotto) Oh boy, that is a good point. Johnny slaps Chet and they all walk off. Mike and the Ooz smile and watch them leave. A group of fans approach.

dialogues.speaker: OOZMA FAN
dialogues.text: Hey Oozmas, you guys are awesome!

dialogues.speaker: OOZMA FAN
dialogues.text: You’ve gotta teach us your moves. Don points to Mike.

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: Well then, you're gonna wanna talk to this guy. ON Mike pleasantly surprised by the attention.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (laughing) Oh, sure I can teach you. Sulley smiles as he watches Mike enjoy his much-earned attention.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: ..-Alright, you wanna hide behind the chair, you have to become the chair...see, the trick to hiding is understanding your surroundings. Sulley spots Dean Hardscrabble as she walks by the VP.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: Thanks for coming, Dean. Sulley follows the dean and then humbly addresses her.  110.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Dean Hardscrabble? If we get back into the scaring program, I hope there’s no hard feelings? She stops and turns to Sulley.

dialogues.speaker: HARDSCRABBLE
dialogues.text: Tomorrow each of you must prove that you are undeniably scary. And I know for a fact, that one of you is not. Hardscrabble looks over at the team, she lands on Mike. Sulley’s eyes follow.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (effort sounds) It’s as simple as that.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: No, he works harder than anyone.

dialogues.speaker: HARDSCRABBLE
dialogues.text: Do you think he’s scary?

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: He’s the heart and soul of the team.

dialogues.speaker: HARDSCRABBLE
dialogues.text: DO YOU think he’s scary? No response. Hardscrabble turns and walks away. Sulley stares after Hardscrabble as she walks off - she c be right, can she? INT. MIKE AND SULLEY’S ROOM, NIGHT ON Mike scaring. Sulley lies on his top bunk, staring at nothing.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (Roar) We’re gonna win this thing tomorrow, Sull, I can feel it! Mike sits on the edge of his bed, grabbing his hat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll finally have our lives back on track.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Hey, Mike? Sulley leans over the bed to face Mike.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You know, you’ve given me a lot of really great tips. I’d love to return the favor sometime.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Oh yeah, sure. Anytime. ON Sulley clearing furniture to make room. Mike stands in the middle of the room, watching Sulley.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: We're doing this now? Sulley grabs Mike’s textbook.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Okay, you've memorized every textbook, every scare theory and that is great. He tosses the book out the window.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Hey! We hear a cat squeal outside.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: But now, it’s time to forget all that. Just reach deep down and “Let the Scary Out."

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Huh, just feel it.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Exactly. Go wild.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (hesitant) I don’t know...I’ve kind of got my own technique. 111.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give it a try. Mike looks at Sulley.... QUICK CUTS OF MIKE PRACTICING WITH SULLEY.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (Roar!)

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Good, but bigger!

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (Roar!)

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Oh, you’re thinking again! From the gut!

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (Roar!)

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Let the animal out!

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (Roar!)

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Come on! Dig deep! Mike roars at Sulley.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (ROAR! )

dialogues.speaker: MS. SQUIBBLES, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Boys! It’s a school night! Mike and Sulley stop and look toward the disembodied voic Ms. Squibbles.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (out of breath) So, how was that? Sulley smiles and puts up his hand for a high five.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Up top. Mike high-fives him. Both guys make their way back to bed 112.  113.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Ha ha! You know, it did feel different. Sulley jumps up into his bunk.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: (laughing)

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: I feel like it’s all coming together. Mike hops into bed. He moves his hat over and turns off t light.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Yep, this time tomorrow, the whole school is finally gonna see what Mike Wazowski can do.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: You're darn right. Mike turns over and falls asleep. Sulley’s smile fades to look of concern.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shots of the students heading to the final event of the S Games as the alma mater plays. We follow some flying monsters as they descend into the arena.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The alma mater ends.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: Welcome to the final competition of the Scare Games! The crowd cheers the two remaining teams.

dialogues.speaker: WOO, YEAH
dialogues.text: Hardscrabble appears farther away in the stadium and glan toward Oozma Kappa. Her eyes narrow.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: It’s time to see how terrifying you really are in the scare simulators!

dialogues.speaker: ON THE SIMULATORS
dialogues.text: We see a simulator for each team. ON Mike, daunted but ready for the challenge. ON the Greek Council president.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: (ominously) But be warned, each simulated scare has been set to the highest difficulty level! ON the misfits.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: (nervous ) The HIGHEST level?!

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: First scarers to the starting line! A little more nervous now, Mike takes a breath and turns his team.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Okay, just like we planned... I’1l go first, then Don---

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Hold on. (to the Oozmas) Mike’s the one who started all of this. And I think it’s only right if he’s the one who finishes it. I think you should go last.

dialogues.speaker: ART
dialogues.text: Yes, yes, right on!

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: Alright!  115.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: Yeah Mike, finish strong!

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: All right...Don, you okay going first?

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: (nervous ) I guess I’m as ready as I'll ever be. All hands in the circle-

dialogues.speaker: OOZMA KAPPA
dialogues.text: Oooooccozma Kappa!

dialogues.speaker: MOMENTS LATER
dialogues.text: The games begin with Don going up against Reggie. Don loo at his competitor.

dialogues.speaker: REGGIE
dialogues.text: (pumping himself up) I'm gonna do it, gonna take him down.... Johnny yells from off to the side.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Hey Bruiser, you take it easy on Grandpa! Art calls from the other side.

dialogues.speaker: ART
dialogues.text: Unleash the beast, Don! Don looks nervous, but does his best to cover.

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: Okay, then. A light flashes red, yellow, green. GO! They're off! Don gets to his door, pulls out a dossier an reads the info on his child. A Jumbotron shows Don enteri the room, carefully. The crowd waits with anticipation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don finds the room filled with toxic toys, he scratches h chin unsure how to proceed then looks at his tentacles an gets an idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meanwhile, Reggie creeps into his room and steps on a squ rubber duck, accidentally. But he recovers. As the sim kid sits up, Reggie turns and scares him immediately.

dialogues.speaker: AHHHHHH
dialogues.text: The scoreboard shows Reggie’s score. Johnny is not happy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He comes out cheering, as if he did well.

dialogues.speaker: REGGIE
dialogues.text: (cheering)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sim kid sits up and we see Don on the ceiling. He swo down toward the bed, hanging by an arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reggie sees Don’s scare register on the board, and eclips his by a small percent. The Oozmas are thrilled!  117.

dialogues.speaker: REGGIE
dialogues.text: Huh? ON Don stepping out of the simulator with new found confidence. He looks to Reggie and the RORs.

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: (confident) Thanks for taking it easy on grampa. Reggie and the RORs are a little shocked. ON SIMULATOR as two referees finish rearranging the toys the room, they give the thumbs up when it’s ready.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: Next group to the starting line!

dialogues.speaker: TERRI /TERRY
dialogues.text: LET’S DO THIS! Green light turns on, GO! Terri and Terry take off against Chet from the RORs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chet dances his claws around the toys to the bed and lets a fearsome roar.

dialogues.speaker: CHET
dialogues.text: (roar)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The score board shows Chet taking the lead over the OKs. RORs cheer at Chet’s score.

dialogues.speaker: ROR BROTHERS
dialogues.text: (cheering)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A door opens and in walks the silhouette of a human. But then the human splits apart into a four-armed, two-headed creature and lunges into the foreground revealing Terri a Terry, roaring. The kid screams.

dialogues.speaker: TERRI/TERRY
dialogues.text: (roar) On score board showing this scare taking the OKs just bel the RORs’ lead.

dialogues.speaker: OOZMA KAPPA
dialogues.text: (cheers )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A sim kid lies quietly in bed when the closet door opens. that Squishy in front of the door? The kid’s eyes scan th room and go back to the door, Squishy’s gone. A second later, the kid turns and Squishy is suddenly rig beside him. The sim kid screams and Squishy’s scream can fills up jus over half way. Score board shows Oozmas have taken a small lead! Squishy’s mom cheers wildly.

dialogues.speaker: MS. SQUIBBLES
dialogues.text: (Cheer! )

dialogues.speaker: YEAAAHHH
dialogues.text: ON ROR sim kid as Chip does a terrifying scare.

dialogues.speaker: ROAR
dialogues.text: ON Scoreboard as the RORs reach past the Oozmas. ON Mike and the team watching dejected. But they rally.  119.

dialogues.speaker: OOZMA KAPPA
dialogues.text: (pumping him up) Come on Art, you can do it!/Come on buddy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Art comes in, taking large steps across the room then balancing on his hands. It’s a mixture of break-dancing a yoga. He flattens and rolls under the bed. A four-armed bug monster from the ROR team let's loose hi scare. ON scoreboard as the bug guy creates an even bigger lead.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY AND ROR BROTHERS
dialogues.text: (cheering) Yes! ON sim kid. Art appears at the kid’s side and strikes a strange yoga pose.

dialogues.speaker: ART
dialogues.text: (warbled) Roar! Art’s scream can only fills up halfway. Not enough points pull up to the RORs. ON MIKE, disappointed. It’s not looking good for the Oozm the RORs have too big a lead. But they rally anyway.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: Next up, Sullivan and Boggs! Randy and Sulley take their places at the starting line. The light turns and they're off! Sulley stops at the door, opens his dossier. ON the dossier. “7-year-old, lives on Kauai and is afraid thunder and lions.” Mike watches as Sulley studies the information.  120.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (sotto) You got this, Sull.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sulley heads inside. He carefully dodges every obstacle a positions himself at the end of the bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mike and the misfits watch Sulley on the Jumbotron.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Randy disappears into his room, climbing the walls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sulley slowly lurches up over the kid and does a big roar

dialogues.speaker: ROAR
dialogues.text: The room shakes and the sim kid screams. ON RANDY, as his simulator shakes from Sulley’s roar. Randy drops to the ground and is thrown off his game. He blends into a heart rug this time and lets out a meager r

dialogues.speaker: RANDY
dialogues.text: (lame)

dialogues.speaker: ROAR
dialogues.text: ON SCOREBOARD showing the scores are now tied!

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: And it’s all tied up! Sulley joins his team as they celebrate. They’re almost there.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: Oh, tough break for the RORs! Randy sees them celebrating as he backs up and runs right into Johnny.

dialogues.speaker: RANDY
dialogues.text: Huh? Johnny is fuming.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Hearts?!! Johnny stares daggers at Randy.

dialogues.speaker: CHET
dialogues.text: Way to go, Boggs! Randy looks back at Oozma Kappa celebrating.

dialogues.speaker: RANDY
dialogues.text: (to himself) That's the last time I lose to you, Sullivan.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: Worthington and Wazowski to the starting line! All eyes on Mike. Mike pauses, a bit of doubt setting in. He looks over and sees Hardscrabble looking in his direction. Sulley approaches Mike.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Hey. Don't worry about Hardscrabble, don't worry about anyone else. Just go out there and show ‘em what Mike Wazowski can do. Mike’s nervousness fades when he hears this.  122.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Thanks. Mike heads to the starting line. He’s right next to Johnn

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Don’t take the loss too hard. You never belonged here anyway. Mike’s eye narrows. For the first time he looks determine The light turns and they're off! Mike and Johnny are neck and neck. They enter their simulators. INTERCUT as they both approach the sim kid. Johnny creeps toward the bed. Mike takes his time, dodging toys and distracting the kid with a scratch to the bed. Johnny goes in for the kill.

dialogues.speaker: ROAR
dialogues.text: ON SCOREBOARD Johnny almost fills his can, taking the tea lead close to the top.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL VP
dialogues.text: Amazing performance by Worthington! We see Johnny walking out like a champion.

dialogues.speaker: ROR BROTHERS
dialogues.text: (chanting)

dialogues.speaker: CHET
dialogues.text: Johnny, you’re my hero!

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: The Oozmas will need a record breaking scare to win this! ON SULLEY, anxiously waiting on Mike's scare. Mike crouches by the bed, contemplating his next move. Ev discouraging statement floating through his mind.... MEAN KID O.S. You don’t belong on a scare floor.  123. JOHNNY O.S. No one will remember you. HARDSCRABBLE O.S. You're not scary. And then Sulley...

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Come on, dig deep! Mike’s eye opens and he leaps up over the bed and ROARS!

dialogues.speaker: ROAR
dialogues.text: The can fills to the top! Oozma Kappa’s point tally beats the ROR house! Everyone g wild.

dialogues.speaker: CROWD
dialogues.text: (Huge Cheer!) ON HARDSCRABBLE in the audience, stunned.

dialogues.speaker: GREEK COUNCIL PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: They did it! YEAHHHHHHH!! She grabs the VP and pushes him over as she cheers wildly The crowd rushes the stadium, flying by the stunned ROR brothers. Mike steps from the simulator, stunned as he realizes wha has happened. The Oozma Kappas run to Mike, hoisting him on to their shoulders.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: YEAH!! We're in the scare program! The Oozma Kappas are celebrating, hugging each other. Don cheers on Squishy.

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: You son of gun! Way to go!  124. Ms. Squibbles is cheering too. Don turns and unknowingly hugs her.

dialogues.speaker: MS. SQUIBBLES
dialogues.text: Oh yeah!! Surprised, they pull back but his tentacles get stuck....

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: (stuck efforts) Oh, little stuck...

dialogues.speaker: MS. SQUIBBLES
dialogues.text: (embarrassed vocs) Oh...

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: Pardon me, there, Ms. Squibbles. They both felt something, and they study each other intensely, as if for the first time....

dialogues.speaker: MS. SQUIBBLES
dialogues.text: It’s Sheri... Awkward but sweet moment. ON THE OOZMAs as we pull out....

dialogues.speaker: ON OOZMA KAPPA
dialogues.text: The brothers of Oozma Kappa shake hands with fans and fin soaking up the moment.

dialogues.speaker: NERDY FAN
dialogues.text: Way to go, Oozma Kappa!

dialogues.speaker: TERRI, TERRY
dialogues.text: Thank you/Thanks a lot.

dialogues.speaker: OOZMA FAN
dialogues.text: You rule!

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: I have never ruled before.  125. Squishy holds the trophy, admiring it.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: (laughing) You guys killed it out there....

dialogues.speaker: ART
dialogues.text: (laughing) Awesome. Sulley laughs as he looks for Mike.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: (calling out) Hey Wazowski! Come on, let’s go, you maniac! We’re celebrating! Sulley finds Mike standing alone in the Oozma’s simulator

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Mike? Mike is beaming, lost in his own little world.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: I did it. I can’t believe it. Sulley smiles.... Mike turns around.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I’m gonna be a scarer!

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: (laughing) Yeah, yes, you are! Mike turns to the sim kid one more time.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Hey, you hear that? Get plenty of rest kidd-o....You haven’t seen the last of Mike Wazowski. BOO! Mike playfully throws his hands in the air toward the sim --to his shock the sim kid shoots out of bed and lets out terrifying scream, reacting just as wildly as it did in t competition. Mike leaps back in shock. Mike turns to see the can fill all the way to the top.  126. Sulley says nothing, he looks confused, slightly worried.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I knew I was scary, I didn’t know I was that scary.... Mike chuckles awkwardly, clearly confused.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: (covering) Yeah, we’re so scary, I guess we broke it. C’mon. But Mike approaches the bed slowly, his smile fading. Mik leans in and snaps his fingers right by the sim kid’s hea The dummy shoots back into the air and screams. Confused, Mike lifts the bed skirt to reveal a control pa We see a row of six gauges with a row down labeled “Easy, “Medium,” and “Hard.”

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: It’s been tampered with.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Uh, I don’t think you should be messing with that.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Why are my settings...different? Suddenly it dawns on Mike.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Mike, we should leave. Mike looks at Sulley. Sulley looks cornered. Suddenly it dawns on Mike.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Did you do this?

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Mike.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: DID YOU do this? Sulley struggles then...

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: (ashamed) I...yes, I did, but you don’t understand--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?! Why did you do this? Mike’s face drops, his heart breaks.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: (sigh) You know, just in case...

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: In case of what? Sulley lifts his head and looks at Mike. Suddenly dawns on Mike.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You don’t think I’m scary.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Mike...

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (hurt) You said you believed in me.... (then, angry) But you’re just like Hardscrabble. You're just like everyone else.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Look, you'll get better and better-

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: I’m as scary as you! I’m as scary as anyone!

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: I just wanted to help.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: No, you just wanted to help yourself!

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Well, what was I supposed to do? Let the whole team fail because you don’t have it?! 127. it all And just like that, Sulley’s said it. And Mike is thrown a second. Then his eye narrows, and he storms off. As he does, REVEAL the misfits, who are standing just off stage. They saw the whole thing, and they look hurt/confu /disappointed/angry.  128. While the others walk away, Squishy sets down the trophy shuffles off with them.... ON SULLEY as he tries to process how totally wrong everything's gone. In what was supposed to be a triumphan moment, he’s alone - confused, angry, frustrated....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two door lab students walk by and reveal Mike leaning up against a wall across from the door tech lab.

dialogues.speaker: DOOR LAB STUDENT
dialogues.text: So your calculations were a little off.

dialogues.speaker: DOOR LAB STUDENT
dialogues.text: That door took me ALL semester.

dialogues.speaker: DOOR LAB STUDENT
dialogues.text: It’s too dangerous, the professor's just gonna shred it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sulley walks across campus, still confused, upset. Holdin the trophy limply. As he passes students...

dialogues.speaker: STUDENTS
dialogues.text: There he is! The big guy!/The first of many trophies.... If this is everything Sulley wanted... he’s too out of it notice. He just moves past the students, numb, and glance at his sad reflection in the trophy.

dialogues.speaker: PROFESSOR KNIGHT
dialogues.text: Sullivan! Sulley looks up from the trophy to see Professor Knight. PROFESSOR KNIGHT (CONT’D) Nice work out there. I look forward to having you back in class. Sulley looks conflicted as Knight heads to the School of Scaring.  129.

dialogues.speaker: CHET
dialogues.text: Hey, there he is! REVEAL JOHNNY and the RORs, who walk up.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Looks like I was wrong about you. You're one of us after all.... He holds out a ROR jacket for Sulley.

dialogues.speaker: CHET
dialogues.text: Way to go, Sulley. Welcome back Broham! You are one of us now, okay? So anytime you wanna come hang out and do whatever, you got a Crew....

dialogues.speaker: ROR BROTHERS
dialogues.text: (walla) Yeah!/You’re a ROR/Sullivan!

dialogues.speaker: CHET
dialogues.text: You’re a ROR, buddy! Sulley looks at Johnny, then past him... he sees Knight talking to Dean Hardscrabble, at the entrance to the Scho of Scaring. A look of resolve comes over Sulley’s face - he knows wha has to do. He hands the jacket AND the trophy to Johnny and runs off

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: (flustered) Hey! Where are you going-?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mike stares at the door lab. Several students shut off th light and come out of the lab. Mike casually walks by them, grabbing one of their card k Glancing around, he swipes the card. He waits for the gre light and opens the door, heading in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sulley is in mid-confession to Hardscrabble and Knight.  130.

dialogues.speaker: HARDSCRABBLE
dialogues.text: You did what?

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: My team had nothing to do with it, it was all me...I cheated. Hardscrabble and Knight are stunned.

dialogues.speaker: HARDSCRABBLE
dialogues.text: I expect you off campus by tomorrow. Sulley hangs his head accepting his fate.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: (sotto) Yes ma‘am.

dialogues.speaker: HARDSCRABBLE
dialogues.text: You're a disgrace to this University...and your family name. Sulley is crushed. Suddenly, an alarm sounds on campus. A security guard is running by....

dialogues.speaker: HARDSCRABBLE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What’s going on?

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY GUARD
dialogues.text: Someone broke into the door lab!

dialogues.speaker: HARDSCRABBLE
dialogues.text: (sotto) What?! Hardscrabble flies off immediately.... Sulley watches her fly towards the door tech building. It dawns on Sulley...Mike.

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: Oh no...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mike places a scream can in its station. He takes off his and places it on a scream can as he faces off with the do  131. He powers up the door. In the background, we hear security guards trying to get Mike has blocked the door with a cart full of scream cans

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY GUARDS
dialogues.text: (walla) Open the door!/Don’t go in there!/It’s very dangerous! He stands there, unflinching in front of the door. The li turns on above the door and Mike turns the knob. INT. BEDROOM —- NIGHT In the human world, a closet door opens. Mike steps throu it and quietly shuts the door. He’s in the human world!

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (big exhale) He makes his silent, stealthy approach towards the bed, building a scary mood. The kid slowly sits up, sensing something.... Suddenly Mike leaps up and ROARS.

dialogues.speaker: KID
dialogues.text: (gasp) The kid stares at Mike. Mike roars again.

dialogues.speaker: ROAR
dialogues.text: Then the kid smiles.

dialogues.speaker: KID
dialogues.text: You look funny. ON MIKE, as he reacts, confused/disappointed/upset.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (confused) What? Mike hears a COUGH offscreen.  132. The camera pulls out to reveal he’s in a cabin full of be a kid bunked down in each one. A banner hangs on the wall reading, “Camp Teamwork.” The other kids start to wake up. Groggily, they stare at Mike.

dialogues.speaker: KIDS
dialogues.text: (waking up walla) What’s going on?/It’s the middle of the night./He’s a little funny green guy.... Mike is thrown - what should he do? He takes a step back toward the closet door when he turns next to the closet is another kid. He freezes. A beat.

dialogues.speaker: KID
dialogues.text: (playful, back at Mike)

dialogues.speaker: ROAR
dialogues.text: Mike gasps in disbelief. The other kids in the cabin start to get closer. He's trapped!

dialogues.speaker: CAMP KIDS
dialogues.text: (walla) What is that?/Hey, I was sleeping./I wanna touch it./He’s so cute!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sulley runs through the hall and up to the door lab, wher crowd of students is being held back by campus security.

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: James!

dialogues.speaker: HARDSCRABBLE
dialogues.text: No one goes near that door until the authorities arrive.  133. Sulley moves to the front of the crowd near the misfits. Inside the lab, Hardscrabble oversees additional security personnel who are securing the door and investigating the scene.

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: You don’t think that could be-

dialogues.speaker: SULLEY
dialogues.text: It’s Mike.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY
dialogues.text: But he could die out there! Sulley tears down the “Caution Do Not Cross” tape.

dialogues.speaker: SQUISHY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: James, wait! We can help. Don steps forward.

dialogues.speaker: DON
dialogues.text: Leave it to the old, “Master of Sales.” ON Hardscrabble and the guards. They are talking in the d tech lab when Don confidently strolls up to them.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY GUARD
